response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500, which I believe strikes a fair balance between our interests. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
